Disk Usage Analyser can scan specific folders, storage devices and online accounts. It provides both a tree and a graphical representation showing the size of each folder, making it easy to identify where disk space is wasted.

Die Festplattenbelegungsanalyse Baobab kann Ordner, Datenspeicher und Onlinespeicherdienste auswerten.
